WorkItem.Description:
We would love to have basic support for the Gnumeric file format ([url:http://www.gnome.org/gnumeric]). At first, we would like to be able to write a Gnumeric spreadsheet from PHPExcel. If time permits, a basic reader implementation is also on our wish list.
* [url:More on Gnumeric...|http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gnumeric]
* [url:File format documentation|http://projects.gnome.org/gnumeric/doc/file-format-gnumeric.shtml]

Comments.Message: Work on Gnumeric Reader currently in progress
